title: Rachel Hayden Art and Ecology of Practices- Voices with Vervaeke
description:
This is Rachel's second visit to Voices with Vervaeke.  Rachel is putting together an ecology of practices for a martial arts community. We get into dialogos about the role of art and emerging forms art within the religion that is not a religion.

Rachel's contact info:  bodydharmamartialarts@gmail.com
Previous Voices video with Rachel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wtQpb4Yf49Y
